articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Top North Korean official arrives in US
articles.description: The right-hand man to Kim Jong-un is due to meet the US secretary of state in New York.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: White House defiant on Roseanne race row
articles.description: President Trump weighed in after ABC cancelled Roseanne's show over the tweet about an ex-Obama aide.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Ukraine condemned for faking murder
articles.description: Ukraine says it acted to foil a Russian plot to assassinate journalist Arkady Babchenko.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Belgium shooter caught on camera
articles.description: Footage of the man who shot dead two police officers and a civilian in Liège shows him with two guns.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Flying rock crushed Pompeii victim's head
articles.description: Archaeologists find a man who, fleeing the initial Vesuvius eruption, was hit by a giant boulder.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Why Kim Kardashian is at the White House
articles.description: The star meets the president on behalf of a 62-year-old inmate jailed for a first-time drug offence.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Algeria seizes cocaine on container ship
articles.description: More than 20 people are arrested over the haul, which was hidden in boxes marked "halal meat".

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Belgium gunman 'had killed the day before'
articles.description: A man shot dead by police after a murder spree is also suspected of killing a man he met in jail.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Melania Trump tweets to quell rumours
articles.description: "Rest assured, I'm here at the @WhiteHouse w my family," a tweet posted on her account says.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: War Horse author reveals cancer battle
articles.description: The famous children's writer says he has "excellent prospects" after treatment for cancer of the larynx.
